availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Colby H Taylor (Clark County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Son of Herbert M. Taylor and Catharine Taylor. Married to Addie L. Brown Taylor. Father of Addie B. Taylor. Student in Clark County in 1850. Household owned eighteen enslaved persons in Clark County in 1850. Farmer in Clark County, Kentucky in 1860. Household owned twelve enslaved persons in Clark County in 1860. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1863.

Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 1744.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482440.
